name: Quell Zen
description: Quell Zen - the very embodiment of relaxing logic games - features over 200 beautifully crafted challenges.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista/7/8 Processor: 1.66 GHz or faster 32-bit (x86) or 64-bit (x64) processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 1.3 or higher Storage: 150 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Stunning Visuals and Relaxing Gameplay  Quell Zen comes from the same developers who made Quell, Quell Reflect, and Quell Memento. I have been a fan of the series from the beginning.  As such it comes as no surprise that I absolutely love this game!   As usual Fallen Tree Games has outdone themselves with their smooth and stunning visuals. The game looks great, from the screen of an iPhone or a 4k monitor.  The gameplay is as Iâ€™ve come to expect, a soothing and relaxing puzzle experience. Not reliant on twitch reflexes or tricky timing, you can sit back and do each puzzle at your own pace.  I absolutely recommend this game to everyone and anyone who enjoys the challenge of a good puzzle!
